snippet.title: Forza Horizon 2: E3 Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
The E3 Teaser Trailer features a sneak-peek at in-game footage featuring the Lamborghini Huracán, available as a first-to-drive exclusive in Forza Horizon 2. 

Tune in to the Xbox E3 2014 Media Briefing on June 9, 9:30 AM Pacific for the full gameplay reveal.  

Forza Horizon 2  
Developer: Playground Games and Turn 10
Genre: Racing
Platform: Xbox One and Xbox 360
Publisher: Microsoft Studios
Website: www.xbox.com/forza
